LIST_ALL_STUDENTS: SELECT * FROM Student, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress WHERE Student.personalInformationId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalAddress.id=PersonalInformation.addressId
STUDENT_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM Student, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress WHERE Student.personalInformationId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalAddress.id=PersonalInformation.addressId AND Student.studentId=
LIST_ALL_LECTURERS: SELECT * FROM Lecturer, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress WHERE Lecturer.personalInformationId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalAddress.id=PersonalInformation.addressId
LECTURER_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM Lecturer, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress WHERE Lecturer.personalInformationId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalAddress.id=PersonalInformation.addressId AND Lecturer.lecturerId=
INSERT_DEVICE: INSERT INTO Device(serial, name, brand, description, type) VALUES
LIST_ALL_STAFFS: SELECT * FROM Staff, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress WHERE Staff.personalInformationId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalAddress.id=PersonalInformation.addressId
STAFF_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM Staff, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress WHERE Staff.personalInformationId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalAddress.id=PersonalInformation.addressId AND Staff.id=
LIST_ALL_PERSONAL_INFOS: SELECT Info.name, Info.phone, Info.gender, Info.email, Info.dateOfBirth, Info.id, Info.addressId, Ad.streetDetails, Ad.ward, Ad.district, Ad.city, Ad.country FROM PersonalInformation as Info, PersonalAddress as Ad WHERE Info.addressId = Ad.id
INSERT_PERSONAL_INFO: INSERT INTO PersonalInformation(name, phone, gender, dateOfBirth, email, addressId) VALUES
INSERT_PERSONAL_ADDRESS: INSERT INTO PersonalAddress(addressId, streetDetails, ward, district, city, country) VALUES
LIST_ALL_COURSES: SELECT * FROM Course, Class WHERE Class.courseId=Course.id
LIST_ALL_CLASSES_IN_COURSE: SELECT * FROM Course, Class WHERE Class.courseId=Course.id AND Course.id=
INSERT_COURSE: INSERT INTO Course(courseId, courseName, description) VALUES
LIST_ALL_CLASSROOMS: SELECT * FROM ClassRoom, Room WHERE ClassRoom.roomId = Room.id
CLASSROOM_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM ClassRoom, Room WHERE ClassRoom.roomId = Room.id AND ClassRoom.id=
LIST_ALL_OFFICES: SELECT * FROM Office, Room WHERE Office.roomId = Room.id
OFFICE_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM Office, Room WHERE Office.roomId = Room.id AND Office.id=
LIST_ALL_CLASSES: SELECT *, Class.id FROM Class, Course WHERE Class.courseId=Course.id
INSERT_CLASS: INSERT INTO Class(classId, className, courseId, beginDate, endDate, description) VALUES
CLASS_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM Class, Course WHERE Class.courseId=Course.id AND Class.classId=
LIST_ALL_STUDENTS_IN_CLASS: SELECT *, Student.studentId, ClassDetails.classId FROM Class, ClassDetails, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress, Student, StudyResult WHERE ClassDetails.classId=Class.id AND ClassDetails.joinerId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalInformation.addressId= PersonalAddress.id AND PersonalInformation.id=Student.personalInformationId AND StudyResult.studentId = Student.id AND Class.classId=
LIST_ALL_LECTURERS_IN_CLASS: SELECT * FROM Class, ClassDetails, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress, Lecturer WHERE ClassDetails.classId=Class.id AND ClassDetails.joinerId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalInformation.addressId= PersonalAddress.id AND PersonalInformation.id=Lecturer.personalInformationId AND Class.classId=
LIST_ALL_JOINERS_IN_CLASS: SELECT * FROM Class, ClassDetails, PersonalInformation, PersonalAddress, Lecturer WHERE ClassDetails.classId=Class.id AND ClassDetails.joinerId=PersonalInformation.id AND PersonalInformation.addressId= PersonalAddress.id AND PersonalInformation.id=Lecturer.personalInformationId AND Class.classId=
LIST_ALL_CLASS_DETAILS: SELECT * FROM Class, ClassDetails, PersonalInformation WHERE ClassDetails.classId=Class.id AND ClassDetails.joinerId=PersonalInformation.id
INSERT_CLASS_DETAIL: INSERT INTO ClassDetails(classId, joinerId, role) VALUES
LIST_ALL_ROOM_SCHEDULES: SELECT * FROM RoomSchedule, Room, Class, WeeklySchedule WHERE RoomSchedule.scheduleId = WeeklySchedule.id AND RoomSchedule.roomId=Room.id AND RoomSchedule.classId=Class.id
INSERT_ROOM_SCHEDULE: INSERT INTO RoomSchedule(scheduleId, roomId, classId) VALUES
ROOM_SCHEDULE_DETAIL: SELECT * FROM RoomSchedule, Room, Class, WeeklySchedule WHERE RoomSchedule.scheduleId = WeeklySchedule.id AND RoomSchedule.roomId=Room.id AND RoomSchedule.classId=Class.id AND RoomSchedule.id=
ACCOUNT_BY_USERNAME: SELECT * FROM Account, Role WHERE Account.roleId = Role.id AND Account.username=
INSERT_ACCOUNT: INSERT INTO Account(username, password, roleId) VALUES
